Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, welcome. <MYNAME>, thank you for
coming.
<PAGE>
Emma, thank you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
No problem. I'll leave you to it.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you!
<PAGE>
As you're new to town, I thought I'd
explain how to shop here.
<PAGE>
Would that be okay?

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right, then I'll explain how to go
about buying things.
